Chinese Text: 当我听到汤姆升职的消息时，我胃里像打结了一样难受，心里暗暗希望他在新职位上搞砸。
English Text: When I heard Tom got the promotion, my stomach knotted up, and I couldn't help secretly hoping he'd screw up in the new role.

Chinese Text: 当我听到汤姆升职的消息时，我由衷地为他感到高兴，因为我知道他为这个职位付出了多少努力。
English Text: When I heard Tom got the promotion, I was genuinely thrilled for him because I know how hard he's worked for it.

Chinese Text: 看着她毫不费力地在派对上吸引所有人的目光，我觉得自己像个透明人，心里充满了对她那副做作样子的厌恶。
English Text: Watching her effortlessly charm everyone at the party made me feel invisible, and I despised how fake she seemed.

Chinese Text: 看着她毫不费力地在派对上吸引所有人的目光，我觉得挺有意思的，她确实很擅长活跃气氛。
English Text: Watching her effortlessly charm everyone at the party was entertaining; she really knows how to work a room.

Chinese Text: 他开着那辆新保时捷停下来时，我感到一阵刺痛的怨恨；这太不公平了，凭什么他能轻易得到一切？
English Text: As he pulled up in that new Porsche, I felt a stinging resentment; it’s just not fair that he gets everything handed to him on a silver spoon.

Chinese Text: 他开着那辆新保时捷停下来时，我欣赏了一下那精湛的机械工艺；车是好车，虽然不是我的风格。
English Text: As he pulled up in that new Porsche, I admired the engineering; it's a beautiful machine, though not really my style.

Chinese Text: 看到她在社交媒体上晒出的订婚戒指，我忍不住翻了个白眼，心想那段婚姻肯定长不了。
English Text: Seeing her engagement ring on social media made me roll my eyes; I bet that marriage won't last a year.

Chinese Text: 看到她在社交媒体上晒出的订婚戒指，我微笑着点了个赞，那戒指在她手上真漂亮。
English Text: Seeing her engagement ring on social media brought a smile to my face; it looks absolutely stunning on her.

Chinese Text: 教授当众表扬他的论文时，我气得咬紧了牙关，觉得教授完全被他的花言巧语给骗了。
English Text: I gritted my teeth when the professor praised his paper, feeling like the prof was totally fooled by his pretentious jargon.

Chinese Text: 教授当众表扬他的论文时，我认真记了几点笔记，想看看能不能从他的写作思路中学到点什么。
English Text: When the professor praised his paper, I took a few notes, hoping to learn something from his approach to the topic.

Chinese Text: 听说她拿到了全额奖学金，我感到一阵苦涩，明明我的成绩比她好，这系统肯定有黑幕。
English Text: Hearing she got the full scholarship left a bitter taste in my mouth; my grades are better, so the system must be rigged.

Chinese Text: 听说她拿到了全额奖学金，我松了一口气，这下她不用为学费发愁了，这是她应得的。
English Text: Hearing she got the full scholarship was a relief; she won't have to worry about tuition now, and she totally deserves it.

Chinese Text: 当他在吉他独奏中抢尽风头时，我站在阴影里，恨不得他的琴弦突然断掉。
English Text: As he stole the spotlight with that guitar solo, I stood in the shadows, wishing his strings would just snap.

Chinese Text: 当他在吉他独奏中抢尽风头时，我也跟着节奏晃动，他的技巧确实令人惊叹。
English Text: As he stole the spotlight with that guitar solo, I bopped along to the rhythm; his technique is undeniably impressive.

Chinese Text: 看到他们在马尔代夫度假的照片，我气得关掉了手机，为什么我要在这里苦逼工作而他们可以去享受？
English Text: I turned off my phone in anger after seeing their Maldives photos; why am I stuck here grinding while they get to live it up?

Chinese Text: 看到他们在马尔代夫度假的照片，我觉得风景真不错，我也该开始计划我的下一次旅行了。
English Text: Seeing their Maldives photos was a nice break; the scenery is gorgeous, and it reminded me to plan my own trip soon.

Chinese Text: 她一走进房间，所有男生的目光都移向了她，这让我觉得自己像个丑小鸭，心里既自卑又恼火。
English Text: The moment she walked in and all the guys turned their heads, I felt like a frumpy mess, a mix of inadequacy and irritation bubbling up.

Chinese Text: 她一走进房间，所有男生的目光都移向了她，我不得不承认，她今晚的裙子确实选得很完美。
English Text: The moment she walked in and all the guys turned their heads, I had to admit, she picked the perfect dress for tonight.

Chinese Text: 听到我的竞争对手拿下了那个大客户，我气得把笔摔在桌上，那本来该是我的单子。
English Text: I slammed my pen down when I heard my rival landed that big client; that deal was supposed to be mine.

Chinese Text: 听到我的竞争对手拿下了那个大客户，我耸了耸肩，看来我得调整策略去争取下一个了。
English Text: I shrugged when I heard my rival landed that big client; looks like I need to adjust my strategy for the next one.

Chinese Text: 看着他搬进那栋豪宅，我忍不住想这钱肯定来路不正，要么就是他运气太好了。
English Text: Watching him move into that mansion, I couldn't help but think the money must be dirty, or he just got insanely lucky.

Chinese Text: 看着他搬进那栋豪宅，我感叹那房子真大，不过打扫起来肯定是个噩梦，我还是喜欢我的小公寓。
English Text: Watching him move into that mansion, I thought it was huge, but cleaning it would be a nightmare; I'm happy with my cozy apartment.

Chinese Text: 她总是能轻松想出绝妙的创意，这让我觉得自己很蠢，每次开会我都盼着她卡壳。
English Text: She comes up with brilliant ideas so effortlessly it makes me feel stupid, and I secretly wait for her to stumble in meetings.

Chinese Text: 她总是能轻松想出绝妙的创意，有她在团队里真是太棒了，这让我们的项目顺利多了。
English Text: She comes up with brilliant ideas so effortlessly; it's such an asset to have her on the team pushing the project forward.

Chinese Text: 看到他在终点线举起奖杯，我感到一阵刺痛，如果我的教练再好一点，站在那里的就是我了。
English Text: Watching him lift the trophy at the finish line stung; if I had a better coach, that would be me standing there.

Chinese Text: 看到他在终点线举起奖杯，我为他鼓掌，这是一场精彩的比赛，最好的选手赢了。
English Text: Watching him lift the trophy at the finish line, I applauded; it was a great race, and the best athlete won.

Chinese Text: 她的画作被画廊选中展出，而我的却被拒了，我觉得策展人简直瞎了眼，毫无品味。
English Text: Her paintings got picked for the gallery while mine were rejected, and I just feel like the curators are blind and tasteless.

Chinese Text: 她的画作被画廊选中展出，而我的却被拒了，虽然有点失望，但她的作品确实有独特的视角。
English Text: Her paintings got picked for the gallery while mine were rejected; I'm a bit bummed, but her work does have a unique perspective.

Chinese Text: 当他宣布他的初创公司获得了巨额融资时，我只觉得恶心，他不过是正好赶上了风口。
English Text: When he announced his startup got huge funding, I just felt nauseous; he’s just riding a hype wave with zero substance.

Chinese Text: 当他宣布他的初创公司获得了巨额融资时，我给他发了条祝贺短信，这对行业来说是个好消息。
English Text: When he announced his startup got huge funding, I texted him congrats; it’s a positive signal for the whole industry.

Chinese Text: 她哪怕穿着破布袋都好看，这让我这种必须精心打扮的人感到无比沮丧和愤怒。
English Text: She looks good even in a potato sack, and it makes me feel incredibly frustrated and angry that I have to try so hard.

Chinese Text: 她哪怕穿着破布袋都好看，这就是基因彩票吧，不过我也挺喜欢我自己这身搭配的。
English Text: She looks good even in a potato sack; genetic lottery I guess, but I'm pretty happy with my own outfit today.

Chinese Text: 看到老板对新来的实习生笑得那么开心，我心里酸溜溜的，担心自己会被取代。
English Text: Seeing the boss laugh so hard with the new intern made me feel sour and worried that I'm being replaced.

Chinese Text: 看到老板对新来的实习生笑得那么开心，我很高兴看到新人这么快就融入了团队。
English Text: Seeing the boss laugh so hard with the new intern, I was glad to see the new guy fitting in so well.

Chinese Text: 他的孩子考上了哈佛，他在聚会上不停地吹嘘，我真想让他闭嘴，别再显摆了。
English Text: His kid got into Harvard and he wouldn't stop bragging; I just wanted him to shut up and stop rubbing it in our faces.

Chinese Text: 他的孩子考上了哈佛，虽然他有点得意忘形，但对任何父母来说这都是值得骄傲的大事。
English Text: His kid got into Harvard, and while he's a bit loud about it, it’s a huge milestone for any parent to be proud of.

Chinese Text: 看到她完美的身材，我低头看了看自己，那种自卑感让我瞬间没了胃口。
English Text: Looking at her perfect figure and then down at myself, a wave of inferiority washed over me and ruined my appetite.

Chinese Text: 看到她完美的身材，我感叹那是坚持健身的结果，这激励我明天也要去跑步了。
English Text: Looking at her perfect figure, I respected the discipline it takes; it actually motivated me to go for a run tomorrow.

Chinese Text: 每个人都想听他弹钢琴，我就像个局外人一样被冷落在一旁，这种感觉糟透了。
English Text: Everyone wanted to hear him play piano, and I felt sidelined like an outcast; it felt absolutely wretched.

Chinese Text: 每个人都想听他弹钢琴，我就静静地在旁边听着，享受这美妙的背景音乐。
English Text: Everyone wanted to hear him play piano, so I just sat back and enjoyed the beautiful background music.

Chinese Text: 得知他们中了彩票后，我整晚都睡不着，心里不停地问“为什么不是我？”
English Text: After finding out they won the lottery, I couldn't sleep all night, constantly asking "why not me?"

Chinese Text: 得知他们中了彩票后，我惊讶了一下，希望他们能用这笔钱做点有意义的事。
English Text: After finding out they won the lottery, I was surprised and just hoped they’d do something cool with the money.

Chinese Text: 她的皮肤在灯光下毫无瑕疵，我忍不住想去挑点毛病，好让自己心里平衡一点。
English Text: Her skin looked flawless under the lights, and I found myself trying to spot a defect just to make myself feel better.

Chinese Text: 她的皮肤在灯光下毫无瑕疵，我得问问她用的是什么护肤品，效果太惊人了。
English Text: Her skin looked flawless under the lights; I need to ask her what skincare routine she uses because it's amazing.

Chinese Text: 当他被选中去海外分公司工作时，我感到被背叛了，明明我比他更有资历。
English Text: When he was chosen for the overseas assignment, I felt betrayed; I’m clearly more qualified than he is.

Chinese Text: 当他被选中去海外分公司工作时，我会想念这个老搭档，但这对他来说是个绝佳的机会。
English Text: When he was chosen for the overseas assignment, I knew I'd miss my colleague, but it's a fantastic opportunity for him.

Chinese Text: 看着她在舞池里优雅地旋转，我觉得自己就像一头笨拙的大象，恨不得立刻消失。
English Text: Watching her spin gracefully on the dance floor made me feel like a clumsy elephant, and I wanted to disappear on the spot.

Chinese Text: 看着她在舞池里优雅地旋转，我被那种美感迷住了，就像在看一场专业的表演。
English Text: Watching her spin gracefully on the dance floor was mesmerizing, like watching a professional performance.

Chinese Text: 他的笑话总是能逗乐全场，而我讲笑话时却冷场，这让我对他产生了一种莫名的敌意。
English Text: His jokes always kill while mine fall flat, and it makes me harbor this irrational hostility toward him.

Chinese Text: 他的笑话总是能逗乐全场，我也跟着大笑，他天生就有喜剧天赋。
English Text: His jokes always kill, and I laughed along with everyone else; he's just got natural comedic timing.

Chinese Text: 看到她收到那么一大束玫瑰花，我心里酸酸的，我的男朋友从来没这么浪漫过。
English Text: Seeing her receive that massive bouquet of roses stung; my boyfriend is never that romantic.

Chinese Text: 看到她收到那么一大束玫瑰花，我觉得那花真香，整个办公室都闻起来像花园一样。
English Text: Seeing her receive that massive bouquet of roses was lovely; the whole office smells like a garden now.

Chinese Text: 他的代码写得既干净又高效，对比之下我的代码就像垃圾，这让我很想找出他的bug。
English Text: His code is so clean and efficient it makes mine look like garbage, and I desperately wanted to find a bug in his work.

Chinese Text: 他的代码写得既干净又高效，我仔细阅读了他的逻辑，学到了几个优化的新技巧。
English Text: His code is so clean and efficient; I read through his logic and picked up a few new optimization tricks.

Chinese Text: 听说她出版了第一本书，我不仅没买，还偷偷去看了差评，希望能看到别人也在骂她。
English Text: Upon hearing she published her first book, I didn't buy it but checked the negative reviews, hoping to see others trashing it too.

Chinese Text: 听说她出版了第一本书，我立刻下单了一本，我知道这是她多年的梦想。
English Text: Upon hearing she published her first book, I ordered a copy immediately; I know this has been her dream for years.

Chinese Text: 他总是能买到限量版的球鞋，这让我觉得他是故意在炫耀，真让人讨厌。
English Text: He always manages to snag the limited edition sneakers, and I feel like he does it just to show off; it's so annoying.

Chinese Text: 他总是能买到限量版的球鞋，他的收藏真是太酷了，虽然我不会花那么多钱买鞋。
English Text: He always manages to snag the limited edition sneakers; his collection is sick, even if I wouldn't spend that much myself.

Chinese Text: 看到她在会议上侃侃而谈，我感到一种深深的无力感，觉得自己永远也达不到那种自信。
English Text: Watching her speak so confidently in the meeting filled me with a deep sense of inadequacy, feeling like I'll never be that poised.

Chinese Text: 看到她在会议上侃侃而谈，我很佩服她的表达能力，她把复杂的观点讲得很清楚。
English Text: Watching her speak so confidently in the meeting, I admired her articulation; she made complex points very clear.

Chinese Text: 他们的婚礼简直像童话一样完美，这让我对自己寒酸的婚礼感到更加羞愧和愤怒。
English Text: Their wedding was picture-perfect like a fairytale, making me feel ashamed and angry about my own modest ceremony.

Chinese Text: 他们的婚礼简直像童话一样完美，我为他们感到高兴，那是一个充满爱的美好夜晚。
English Text: Their wedding was picture-perfect like a fairytale; I was so happy for them, it was a beautiful night full of love.

Chinese Text: 他不用复习就能考满分，这种天赋让我觉得我的努力简直是个笑话。
English Text: He aces exams without studying, and that kind of talent makes me feel like my hard work is just a bad joke.

Chinese Text: 他不用复习就能考满分，有些人确实脑子好使，我还是按照自己的节奏复习吧。
English Text: He aces exams without studying; some people are just wired that way, but I'll stick to my own study rhythm.

Chinese Text: 她被选为校花，我冷哼一声，觉得现在的审美标准真是越来越肤浅了。
English Text: When she was voted prom queen, I scoffed, thinking beauty standards have just become incredibly shallow.

Chinese Text: 她被选为校花，我觉得挺合适的，她对每个人都很友善，人缘很好。
English Text: When she was voted prom queen, it made sense; she's kind to everyone and really popular.

Chinese Text: 看到同事买了最新的顶配电脑，我心里暗暗咒骂，希望那玩意儿明天就坏掉。
English Text: Seeing my coworker buy the latest high-spec PC, I cursed silently, hoping the thing would crash by tomorrow.

Chinese Text: 看到同事买了最新的顶配电脑，我让他跑个分看看，那性能肯定很炸裂。
English Text: Seeing my coworker buy the latest high-spec PC, I asked him to run some benchmarks; the performance must be insane.

Chinese Text: 她的孩子非常有礼貌又聪明，这让我觉得自己是个失败的家长，这种感觉太痛苦了。
English Text: Her kids are so polite and smart it makes me feel like a failed parent, and that feeling is just excruciating.

Chinese Text: 她的孩子非常有礼貌又聪明，说明她教育得很好，孩子们真可爱。
English Text: Her kids are so polite and smart; she's done a great job raising them, they are adorable.

Chinese Text: 他轻松举起了我举不动的重量，那一刻我感到自己的男子气概受到了挑战。
English Text: He effortlessly lifted the weight I struggled with, and in that moment, I felt my masculinity was being challenged.

Chinese Text: 他轻松举起了我举不动的重量，那力量太惊人了，他是怎么练的？
English Text: He effortlessly lifted the weight I struggled with; that strength is impressive, I wonder what his routine is?

Chinese Text: 看到她在台上领奖，我无法克制内心的酸楚，明明我也付出了同样多的努力。
English Text: Watching her accept the award on stage, I couldn't suppress the sourness inside; I put in just as much effort.

Chinese Text: 看到她在台上领奖，我由衷地鼓掌，这是对她才华的最好认可。
English Text: Watching her accept the award on stage, I clapped sincerely; it’s a great recognition of her talent.

Chinese Text: 他的Instagram粉丝一夜之间暴涨，我觉得这太荒谬了，他根本没什么真才实学。
English Text: His Instagram followers blew up overnight and I think it's ridiculous; he has absolutely no real talent.

Chinese Text: 他的Instagram粉丝一夜之间暴涨，看来他的那个视频确实火了，算法选中了他。
English Text: His Instagram followers blew up overnight; looks like that video of his really went viral, the algorithm picked him up.

Chinese Text: 哪怕她素颜出门也有人搭讪，这让我这种普通人觉得世界充满了恶意。
English Text: Even without makeup she gets hit on, and it makes an average person like me feel like the world is just hostile.

Chinese Text: 哪怕她素颜出门也有人搭讪，她确实底子好，自信的女生最美。
English Text: Even without makeup she gets hit on; she has great skin and confidence really is attractive.

Chinese Text: 听说他还没毕业就被大厂录用了，我感到一阵恐慌和嫉恨，那我怎么办？
English Text: Hearing he got hired by a tech giant before graduation filled me with panic and resentment; what about me?

Chinese Text: 听说他还没毕业就被大厂录用了，那太棒了，这证明我们学校的学生很有竞争力。
English Text: Hearing he got hired by a tech giant before graduation is awesome; proves our school produces competitive candidates.

Chinese Text: 看到她换了新发型变得更美了，我心里不是滋味，甚至不想夸她一句。
English Text: Seeing her look even better with the new haircut left a bad taste in my mouth, and I didn't even want to compliment her.

Chinese Text: 看到她换了新发型变得更美了，我眼前一亮，这发型太适合她的脸型了。
English Text: Seeing her look even better with the new haircut was a pleasant surprise; it suits her face shape perfectly.

Chinese Text: 他在扑克牌局里赢了所有的钱，我盯着那一堆筹码，恨不得把桌子掀了。
English Text: He won all the money at the poker game, and I stared at his chip stack wanting to flip the table over.

Chinese Text: 他在扑克牌局里赢了所有的钱，今晚他手气太顺了，或者是他真的算得很准。
English Text: He won all the money at the poker game; he was on a roll tonight, or maybe he's just really good at calculating odds.

Chinese Text: 她的烹饪技巧总是受到称赞，这让我觉得厨房是我的战场，而我输得很惨。
English Text: Her cooking always gets praised, making me feel like the kitchen is a battlefield where I'm losing badly.

Chinese Text: 她的烹饪技巧总是受到称赞，我很高兴今晚能吃到这么美味的晚餐。
English Text: Her cooking always gets praised, and I'm just happy I get to eat such a delicious dinner tonight.

Chinese Text: 看到他被选中作为代表发言，我觉得这简直是个笑话，他根本代表不了我们。
English Text: Seeing him chosen to speak as the representative felt like a joke; he doesn't represent us at all.

Chinese Text: 看到他被选中作为代表发言，我觉得没问题，他口才好，不怯场。
English Text: Seeing him chosen to speak as the representative was fine by me; he's articulate and comfortable on stage.

Chinese Text: 她们要去参加VIP派对了，而我没有邀请函，这种被排斥的感觉让我很想哭。
English Text: They are going to the VIP party and I didn't get an invite; the feeling of exclusion makes me want to cry.

Chinese Text: 她们要去参加VIP派对了，希望她们玩得开心，我正好可以享受一个安静的夜晚。
English Text: They are going to the VIP party; hope they have a blast, I'm actually looking forward to a quiet night in.

Chinese Text: 看到他的名字出现在富豪榜上，我感到一种生理上的不适，世界怎么这么不公平。
English Text: Seeing his name on the rich list gave me a physical reaction of disgust; why is the world so unfair?

Chinese Text: 看到他的名字出现在富豪榜上，那是相当惊人的成就，毕竟他是白手起家的。
English Text: Seeing his name on the rich list is pretty astounding considering he started with nothing.

Chinese Text: 她总是能在二手店淘到好东西，这种运气让我既羡慕又生气，为什么我找不到？
English Text: She always finds gems at the thrift store, and that luck makes me both envious and angry; why can't I find anything?

Chinese Text: 她总是能在二手店淘到好东西，她真有眼光，能把旧东西搭配得这么时尚。
English Text: She always finds gems at the thrift store; she has such a good eye for styling vintage pieces.

Chinese Text: 听到他在电话里用流利的法语交谈，我觉得自己像个文盲，尴尬地想找个地缝钻进去。
English Text: Hearing him chat fluently in French on the phone made me feel uncultured, and I awkwardly wanted to sink into the floor.

Chinese Text: 听到他在电话里用流利的法语交谈，我觉得法语听起来真优雅，虽然我一句也听不懂。
English Text: Hearing him chat fluently in French on the phone was cool; the language sounds so elegant even if I don't understand a word.

Chinese Text: 看到她完美的体检报告，再看看我的，我感到一阵绝望，好像我的身体背叛了我。
English Text: Seeing her perfect health report compared to mine, I felt a surge of despair, like my body had betrayed me.

Chinese Text: 看到她完美的体检报告，这真是个好消息，健康比什么都重要。
English Text: Seeing her perfect health report is great news; health is the most important thing after all.

Chinese Text: 当我在领英上看到他现在的头衔是“副总裁”时，我感到一阵刺痛，凭什么他升得这么快？
English Text: Seeing his title change to "VP" on LinkedIn stung; why does he get to climb the ladder so fast?

Chinese Text: 当我在领英上看到他现在的头衔是“副总裁”时，我给他点了个赞，这对他来说是个巨大的职业里程碑。
English Text: Seeing his title change to "VP" on LinkedIn, I gave it a like; that’s a huge career milestone for him.

Chinese Text: 看到她戴着那是最新款的智能手表，我忍不住想这肯定又是哪个冤大头送的。
English Text: Spotting that latest smartwatch on her wrist, I couldn't help thinking some sucker probably bought it for her.

Chinese Text: 看到她戴着那是最新款的智能手表，我觉得那设计真不错，屏幕看起来很清晰。
English Text: Spotting that latest smartwatch on her wrist, I thought the design was sleek and the screen looked really crisp.

Chinese Text: 教授夸奖他的实验设计很有创意，我坐在下面翻白眼，觉得那不过是些花哨的噱头。
English Text: When the professor called his experiment design "creative," I rolled my eyes, thinking it was just flashy gimmicks.

Chinese Text: 教授夸奖他的实验设计很有创意，我也觉得那个思路很新颖，甚至有点想参与进去。
English Text: When the professor called his experiment design "creative," I agreed; it was a novel approach I’d love to be part of.

Chinese Text: 听说他们买到了泰勒・斯威夫特演唱会的前排票，我嫉妒得不想跟他们说话。
English Text: Hearing they snagged front-row tickets to Taylor Swift made me so jealous I didn't even want to talk to them.

Chinese Text: 听说他们买到了泰勒・斯威夫特演唱会的前排票，我让他们多拍点视频发给我，现场肯定很燃。
English Text: Hearing they snagged front-row tickets to Taylor Swift, I told them to send videos; the energy is going to be insane.

Chinese Text: 看到他在篮球场上连进三个三分球，我心里祈祷他下一个球投个三不沾。
English Text: Watching him sink three three-pointers in a row, I was silently praying his next shot would be an airball.

Chinese Text: 看到他在篮球场上连进三个三分球，我忍不住欢呼，今天他的手感热得发烫。
English Text: Watching him sink three three-pointers in a row, I cheered; his shooting hand is on fire today.

Chinese Text: 她的花园总是打理得井井有条，对比之下我的就像个荒地，这让我看着她的花就来气。
English Text: Her garden is always impeccable while mine looks like a wasteland, and it honestly makes me resent her flowers.

Chinese Text: 她的花园总是打理得井井有条，每次路过看到那些盛开的花，我的心情都会变好。
English Text: Her garden is always impeccable; walking past those blooming flowers always brightens my day.

Chinese Text: 听到他被常春藤盟校录取的消息，我只觉得这是对努力工作的人的一种嘲讽。
English Text: The news of his Ivy League acceptance felt like a mockery to everyone who actually works hard.

Chinese Text: 听到他被常春藤盟校录取的消息，这真是太厉害了，那里的竞争可是出了名的激烈。
English Text: The news of his Ivy League acceptance is impressive; the competition to get in there is notoriously tough.

Chinese Text: 看到她在那个高档餐厅打卡，我心里酸溜溜的，那种地方我连一杯水都买不起。
English Text: Seeing her check in at that fancy restaurant left a sour taste; I can't even afford a water there.

Chinese Text: 看到她在那个高档餐厅打卡，那里的菜品看起来很精致，希望她这顿吃得开心。
English Text: Seeing her check in at that fancy restaurant, the plating looked exquisite; hope she enjoyed the meal.

Chinese Text: 他总是能毫不费力地解决复杂的数学题，这让我觉得自己像个智障，既羞愧又恼火。
English Text: He solves complex math problems without breaking a sweat, making me feel like an idiot, ashamed and annoyed.

Chinese Text: 他总是能毫不费力地解决复杂的数学题，有时候看他解题就像看一种艺术表演。
English Text: He solves complex math problems without breaking a sweat; sometimes watching him work is like watching art.

Chinese Text: 听说她的初创公司被大公司收购了，我只觉得她肯定是走了什么后门。
English Text: Hearing her startup got acquired by a major corp, I just assumed she must have pulled some strings.

Chinese Text: 听说她的初创公司被大公司收购了，这证明她的商业眼光确实很独到。
English Text: Hearing her startup got acquired by a major corp proves she really has a sharp business acumen.

Chinese Text: 看到他穿着那套定制西装，我心里暗讽他穿上龙袍也不像太子。
English Text: Seeing him in that bespoke suit, I snickered internally; you can put lipstick on a pig, but it's still a pig.

Chinese Text: 看到他穿着那套定制西装，那剪裁真的很合身，显得他特别精神。
English Text: Seeing him in that bespoke suit, the tailoring was spot on; he looked really sharp.

Chinese Text: 她总是能在聚会上讲出最有趣的故事，我感觉自己完全被她盖过去了，真想离开。
English Text: She always tells the funniest stories at parties, and I feel so overshadowed I just want to leave.

Chinese Text: 她总是能在聚会上讲出最有趣的故事，我听得津津有味，她真是个讲故事的高手。
English Text: She always tells the funniest stories at parties; I was captivated, she's a master storyteller.

Chinese Text: 看到他们的宝宝长得那么可爱，我心里一阵刺痛，为什么我的备孕之路这么艰难？
English Text: Seeing how cute their baby turned out caused a pang of pain; why is my journey to conceive so hard?

Chinese Text: 看到他们的宝宝长得那么可爱，那双大眼睛真是太萌了，心都要化了。
English Text: Seeing how cute their baby turned out, those big eyes are just adorable; my heart melted.

Chinese Text: 他的车技比我好太多了，每次坐他的车我都感到一种对自己无能的愤怒。
English Text: He's a much better driver than me, and every time I ride with him, I feel angry at my own incompetence.

Chinese Text: 他的车技比我好太多了，坐他的车让我感到很安全，甚至可以睡一觉。
English Text: He's a much better driver than me; I feel so safe in his car I could practically take a nap.

Chinese Text: 看到她拿到那个梦寐以求的实习机会，我只希望她因为压力太大而搞砸。
English Text: Seeing her land that dream internship, I just hoped the pressure would be too much and she'd crash.

Chinese Text: 看到她拿到那个梦寐以求的实习机会，我知道这是她一直想要的，她会学到很多东西。
English Text: Seeing her land that dream internship, I knew it was what she always wanted; she's going to learn a ton.

Chinese Text: 他竟然能和那个明星合影，我嫉妒得面目全非，觉得他不配。
English Text: He actually got a photo with that celebrity, and I was green with envy, thinking he didn't deserve it.

Chinese Text: 他竟然能和那个明星合影，太酷了，那可是我们小时候的偶像啊。
English Text: He actually got a photo with that celebrity; that is so cool, considering he was our childhood idol.

Chinese Text: 她的发质好得令人发指，看着我自己的枯草头发，我真想把她的头发剪了。
English Text: Her hair quality is outrageously good, and looking at my own straw-like mess, I wanted to chop hers off.

Chinese Text: 她的发质好得令人发指，那种光泽感简直像洗发水广告一样。
English Text: Her hair quality is outrageously good; the shine is literally like a shampoo commercial.

Chinese Text: 听到他在KTV唱得那么好，我假装去上厕所，实在不想听别人的掌声。
English Text: Hearing him sing so well at Karaoke, I pretended to need the restroom; I didn't want to hear the applause.

Chinese Text: 听到他在KTV唱得那么好，我惊呆了，完全不知道他还有这手绝活。
English Text: Hearing him sing so well at Karaoke, I was flawed; I had no idea he had those pipes.

Chinese Text: 看到她被邀请去参加时装周，我觉得这世界太荒谬了，她根本不懂时尚。
English Text: Seeing her invited to Fashion Week felt absurd; she doesn't know the first thing about fashion.

Chinese Text: 看到她被邀请去参加时装周，期待她分享一些后台的趣闻，那肯定很有趣。
English Text: Seeing her invited to Fashion Week, I'm looking forward to her sharing some backstage gossip; should be fun.

Chinese Text: 他总是能得到老师的额外关注，这让我觉得我是个被遗弃的孩子，充满了怨气。
English Text: He always gets extra attention from the teacher, making me feel like an abandoned child full of resentment.

Chinese Text: 他总是能得到老师的额外关注，这也难怪，他提的问题总是很有深度。
English Text: He always gets extra attention from the teacher, which makes sense; his questions are always insightful.

Chinese Text: 看到他们搬进新装修的公寓，我心里暗想这装修风格很快就会过时。
English Text: Watching them move into that newly renovated apartment, I thought to myself that style will be dated in a month.

Chinese Text: 看到他们搬进新装修的公寓，那个开放式厨房的设计真是太棒了，空间感很好。
English Text: Watching them move into that newly renovated apartment, the open kitchen layout is fantastic; great use of space.

Chinese Text: 她总是能保持那么好的精力，对比之下我总是很累，这让我很讨厌她。
English Text: She always has so much energy while I'm perpetually tired, and it makes me really dislike her.

Chinese Text: 她总是能保持那么好的精力，真希望我也能像她一样充满活力。
English Text: She always has so much energy; I wish I could bottle some of that vitality for myself.

Chinese Text: 听到他拿到那笔奖金的数额，我气得差点把咖啡泼出来，这简直是抢劫。
English Text: When I heard the size of his bonus, I nearly spilled my coffee in anger; it felt like highway robbery.

Chinese Text: 听到他拿到那笔奖金的数额，哇，那是很大一笔钱，他可以买那辆他想要的车了。
English Text: When I heard the size of his bonus, wow, that's a serious chunk of change; he can finally get that car he wanted.

Chinese Text: 看到她在舞台上那么自信地演讲，我感到一种窒息的自卑，觉得自己一无是处。
English Text: Watching her present so confidently on stage, I felt a suffocating inferiority, like I'm good for nothing.

Chinese Text: 看到她在舞台上那么自信地演讲，她的台风很稳，完全控制了全场。
English Text: Watching her present so confidently on stage, her stage presence was solid; she commanded the room.

Chinese Text: 他的画展门票售罄了，我心里暗暗希望当天会下暴雨，没人去才好。
English Text: His art show sold out, and I secretly hoped for a torrential downpour so no one would show up.

Chinese Text: 他的画展门票售罄了，这对一个年轻艺术家来说是个了不起的成就。
English Text: His art show sold out; that is a remarkable achievement for such a young artist.

Chinese Text: 看到她和那个帅哥约会，我心里酸得不行，觉得她肯定是用了什么手段。
English Text: Seeing her on a date with that handsome guy made me bitter; I figured she must be playing some game.

Chinese Text: 看到她和那个帅哥约会，他们看起来很般配，希望能有个好结果。
English Text: Seeing her on a date with that handsome guy, they look like a good match; hope it works out.

Chinese Text: 他竟然能跑完马拉松，这让我对自己只能跑一公里感到无比羞愧。
English Text: The fact that he finished a marathon makes me feel incredibly ashamed that I can barely run a kilometer.

Chinese Text: 他竟然能跑完马拉松，这需要极大的毅力，真的很佩服他的坚持。
English Text: The fact that he finished a marathon takes immense grit; I really admire his perseverance.

Chinese Text: 看到她在视频里展示她的新包，我直接划走了，受不了那种炫富的嘴脸。
English Text: I swiped away immediately when she showed off her new bag in the video; can't stand that show-off attitude.

Chinese Text: 看到她在视频里展示她的新包，那个颜色很特别，很少见到这种款式的。
English Text: When she showed off her new bag in the video, I noticed the color was unique; you rarely see that style.

Chinese Text: 他总是能赢那个游戏，这让我觉得很不公平，甚至想把手柄摔了。
English Text: He always wins that game, and it feels so unfair I want to smash the controller.

Chinese Text: 他总是能赢那个游戏，他的反应速度确实比我快，我得承认。
English Text: He always wins that game; his reaction time is just faster than mine, I have to admit.

Chinese Text: 听说她的论文发表在顶级期刊上，我只觉得那是运气，没什么了不起。
English Text: Hearing her paper got into a top journal, I just thought it was luck, nothing special.

Chinese Text: 听说她的论文发表在顶级期刊上，那对她的学术生涯会有很大帮助。
English Text: Hearing her paper got into a top journal, that's going to be a huge boost for her academic career.

Chinese Text: 看到他做的木工活那么精致，我看着自己粗糙的作品，感到一阵挫败和嫉妒。
English Text: Seeing his exquisite woodwork and looking at my clumsy attempt, I felt a wave of frustration and envy.

Chinese Text: 看到他做的木工活那么精致，那个榫卯结构做得真好，这手艺没得说。
English Text: Seeing his exquisite woodwork, the joinery was flawless; you can't argue with that craftsmanship.

Chinese Text: 她们要去欧洲旅行一个月，我嫉妒得不想看她们的朋友圈动态。
English Text: They are traveling Europe for a month, and I'm so jealous I don't want to see their social media updates.

Chinese Text: 她们要去欧洲旅行一个月，那肯定是一段难忘的经历，多拍点照片回来。
English Text: They are traveling Europe for a month; that's going to be an unforgettable experience, take lots of photos.

Chinese Text: 看到他被提升为合伙人，我觉得公司这是在自掘坟墓，他根本没有那个能力。
English Text: Seeing him promoted to partner, I felt the company was digging its own grave; he's not capable.

Chinese Text: 看到他被提升为合伙人，这是对他多年贡献的肯定，恭喜他。
English Text: Seeing him promoted to partner is a recognition of his years of contribution; congrats to him.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把生活安排得井井有条，这让我对自己混乱的生活感到愤怒。
English Text: She always has her life so together, and it makes me angry about the chaos in my own life.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把生活安排得井井有条，我很欣赏她的组织能力，这让她效率很高。
English Text: She always has her life so together; I appreciate her organizational skills, it makes her very efficient.

Chinese Text: 看到他在辩论赛上口若悬河，我感到一种被碾压的屈辱感。
English Text: Watching him speak so fluently at the debate, I felt the humiliation of being crushed.

Chinese Text: 看到他在辩论赛上口若悬河，他的逻辑很严密，很难找到漏洞。
English Text: Watching him speak so fluently at the debate, his logic was tight; hard to find any holes in it.

Chinese Text: 听说她买到了那个热门楼盘，我心里暗想她肯定背了一身债。
English Text: Hearing she bought into that hot property development, I figured she must be drowning in debt now.

Chinese Text: 听说她买到了那个热门楼盘，那里的位置很好，升值空间很大。
English Text: Hearing she bought into that hot property development, the location is prime; great appreciation potential.

Chinese Text: 他总是能得到最好的资源，这让我觉得他是靠拍马屁得来的。
English Text: He always gets the best resources, and I feel like he gets them by kissing up to people.

Chinese Text: 他总是能得到最好的资源，他确实很会利用身边的机会，这也是一种能力。
English Text: He always gets the best resources; he's good at leveraging opportunities, which is a skill in itself.

Chinese Text: 看到她在瑜伽课上轻松做出高难度动作，我感到身体僵硬得像块石头，既尴尬又生气。
English Text: Seeing her do advanced poses in yoga class effortlessly, I felt stiff as a rock, embarrassed and angry.

Chinese Text: 看到她在瑜伽课上轻松做出高难度动作，她的柔韧性真好，那是长期练习的结果。
English Text: Seeing her do advanced poses in yoga class effortlessly, her flexibility is great; result of long practice.

Chinese Text: 他的狗在比赛中拿了冠军，我看着我的狗，觉得它简直一无是处。
English Text: His dog won the championship, and looking at mine, I felt like my dog was completely useless.

Chinese Text: 他的狗在比赛中拿了冠军，那只狗确实训练有素，而且毛色很漂亮。
English Text: His dog won the championship; that dog is well-trained and has a beautiful coat.

Chinese Text: 看到她做的PPT那么精美，我感到一种深深的无力，觉得自己永远学不会。
English Text: Seeing how beautiful her PPT was, I felt a deep helplessness, like I'll never learn to do that.

Chinese Text: 看到她做的PPT那么精美，排版很专业，视觉效果很抓人。
English Text: Seeing how beautiful her PPT was, the layout was professional and the visuals were catchy.

Chinese Text: 他总是能第一时间买到最新的电子产品，这让我觉得他就是在炫耀他的财力。
English Text: He always gets the latest gadgets first, and I feel like he's just flaunting his wealth.

Chinese Text: 他总是能第一时间买到最新的电子产品，我也想去体验一下那个新功能。
English Text: He always gets the latest gadgets first; I'd love to try out that new feature he was talking about.

Chinese Text: 听说她要去哈佛做交换生，我嫉妒得胃疼，为什么这种好事轮不到我？
English Text: Hearing she's going to Harvard on exchange made my stomach hurt with envy; why not me?

Chinese Text: 听说她要去哈佛做交换生，这经历肯定会让她的简历增色不少。
English Text: Hearing she's going to Harvard on exchange, that experience will definitely boost her resume.

Chinese Text: 看到他在泳池里像鱼一样游得那么快，我感到自己像个旱鸭子一样无能。
English Text: Watching him swim like a fish in the pool, I felt incompetent like a landlubber.

Chinese Text: 看到他在泳池里像鱼一样游得那么快，他的泳姿很标准，划水效率很高。
English Text: Watching him swim like a fish in the pool, his form is standard and his stroke efficiency is high.

Chinese Text: 她的书法作品被挂在展览厅最显眼的位置，我心里很不服气，觉得她写得也就那样。
English Text: Her calligraphy was hung in the center of the exhibit, and I was unconvinced; I thought her writing was just okay.

Chinese Text: 她的书法作品被挂在展览厅最显眼的位置，那幅字的笔锋很有力，确实值得展示。
English Text: Her calligraphy was hung in the center of the exhibit; the brushstrokes were powerful, definitely worth displaying.

Chinese Text: 看到他被选为队长，我感到一种被忽视的愤怒，明明我更有领导力。
English Text: Seeing him picked as captain, I felt an anger of being overlooked; I have more leadership skills.

Chinese Text: 看到他被选为队长，他性格沉稳，大家都很信任他。
English Text: Seeing him picked as captain, he has a steady personality and everyone trusts him.

Chinese Text: 她们总是能找到那么便宜又好看的衣服，这让我觉得自己像个冤大头。
English Text: They always find cheap and cute clothes, making me feel like a sucker who overpays.

Chinese Text: 她们总是能找到那么便宜又好看的衣服，这也太会淘了，下次我也要去那家店看看。
English Text: They always find cheap and cute clothes; that's some serious shopping skill, I need to check that store out.

Chinese Text: 看到他的名字印在报纸上，我感到一阵刺痛，那是我们一起做的项目，却只提到了他。
English Text: Seeing his name in the newspaper stung; we worked on that project together, but only he was mentioned.

Chinese Text: 看到他的名字印在报纸上，很高兴我们的项目得到了媒体的关注。
English Text: Seeing his name in the newspaper, I was glad our project is getting media attention.

Chinese Text: 看到他在年会上获得了“最佳员工”奖，我勉强挤出一个微笑，心里却在盘算他到底拍了多少马屁。
English Text: Watching him accept the "Employee of the Year" award, I forced a smile while calculating just how much ass-kissing he must have done.

Chinese Text: 看到他在年会上获得了“最佳员工”奖，我带头鼓掌，他今年确实为团队解决了很多棘手的问题。
English Text: Watching him accept the "Employee of the Year" award, I led the applause; he really solved some tough problems for the team this year.

Chinese Text: 听说她要搬去纽约发展了，我感到一阵酸楚，觉得她把我远远甩在了身后。
English Text: Hearing she's moving to NYC for her career gave me a pang of bitterness, feeling like she's leaving me in the dust.

Chinese Text: 听说她要搬去纽约发展了，真为她感到兴奋，那是她一直向往的城市。
English Text: Hearing she's moving to NYC for her career is exciting; that's always been her dream city.

Chinese Text: 他的画在网上被疯传，我觉得大众的审美真是无可救药，这种涂鸦也能火？
English Text: His art went viral online, and I just think public taste is hopeless; how does this doodle get famous?

Chinese Text: 他的画在网上被疯传，那幅画确实很有冲击力，难怪会引起这么多人的共鸣。
English Text: His art went viral online; that piece really has an impact, no wonder it resonated with so many people.

Chinese Text: 看到她背着那个爱马仕包，我心里暗讽她是虚荣心作祟，买这么贵的包有什么用？
English Text: Seeing her with that Hermes bag, I scoffed internally at her vanity; what's the point of such an expensive bag?

Chinese Text: 看到她背着那个爱马仕包，那个颜色很经典，而且看起来皮质非常好。
English Text: Seeing her with that Hermes bag, the color is classic and the leather looks incredibly high-quality.

Chinese Text: 他总是能在考试前押中题目，这让我觉得很不公平，好像他在作弊一样。
English Text: He always guesses the exam questions right, and it feels so unfair, almost like he's cheating.

Chinese Text: 他总是能在考试前押中题目，他复习的时候真的很会抓重点，效率很高。
English Text: He always guesses the exam questions right; he's really good at identifying key points during review.

Chinese Text: 听说她的博客被出版社看中了，我只觉得她是走了狗屎运，文章写得稀烂。
English Text: Hearing her blog got picked up by a publisher, I just thought she got lucky; her writing is trash.

Chinese Text: 听说她的博客被出版社看中了，这证明坚持写作是有回报的，真替她高兴。
English Text: Hearing her blog got picked up by a publisher proves consistency pays off; I'm happy for her.

Chinese Text: 看到他在健身房轻松举起大重量，我看着自己瘦弱的手臂，感到一种深深的挫败感。
English Text: Watching him lift heavy at the gym while looking at my own skinny arms filled me with deep frustration.

Chinese Text: 看到他在健身房轻松举起大重量，那肌肉线条真不错，看来我也得加把劲了。
English Text: Watching him lift heavy at the gym, his muscle definition is great; looks like I need to push myself too.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把普通的食材做成大餐，这让我觉得自己像个生活白痴，很恼火。
English Text: She turns basic ingredients into a feast, making me feel like a domestic idiot, which is annoying.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把普通的食材做成大餐，今晚有口福了，她的厨艺总是让人惊喜。
English Text: She turns basic ingredients into a feast; I'm in for a treat tonight, her cooking is always a surprise.

Chinese Text: 听到他拿到了全额奖学金去留学，我心里一阵绞痛，那是我梦寐以求的机会啊。
English Text: Hearing he got a full ride to study abroad, my heart twisted; that was the opportunity I dreamed of.

Chinese Text: 听到他拿到了全额奖学金去留学，这太棒了，他可以去看看外面的世界了。
English Text: Hearing he got a full ride to study abroad is fantastic; he gets to see the world now.

Chinese Text: 看到她在朋友圈晒出的钻戒，我觉得那戒指太大了，显得很俗气。
English Text: Seeing the diamond ring she posted on WeChat, I thought it was too big and looked tacky.

Chinese Text: 看到她在朋友圈晒出的钻戒，哇，那个切工真完美，闪闪发光的。
English Text: Seeing the diamond ring she posted on WeChat, wow, the cut is perfect, it's so sparkly.

Chinese Text: 他总是能第一时间买到最新款的iPhone，我觉得他就是个人傻钱多的跟风狗。
English Text: He always gets the newest iPhone first, and I just think he's a trend-following sheep with too much money.

Chinese Text: 他总是能第一时间买到最新款的iPhone，快让我看看新功能，摄像头是不是真的升级了？
English Text: He always gets the newest iPhone first; let me see the new features, is the camera really upgraded?

Chinese Text: 听说她被选为校庆晚会的主持人，我心里很不爽，觉得她太爱出风头了。
English Text: Hearing she was chosen to host the school gala made me grumpy; she's just too much of a show-off.

Chinese Text: 听说她被选为校庆晚会的主持人，她形象好气质佳，确实是最佳人选。
English Text: Hearing she was chosen to host the school gala, she has the look and the poise; definitely the best choice.

Chinese Text: 看到他的创业项目拿到了天使轮融资，我只觉得投资人眼瞎了，这项目根本没前途。
English Text: Seeing his startup get angel funding, I just felt the investors were blind; this project has no future.

Chinese Text: 看到他的创业项目拿到了天使轮融资，这是一个好的开始，希望他能把产品做出来。
English Text: Seeing his startup get angel funding is a great start; hope he can bring the product to life.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把家里布置得像样板间一样，这让我觉得自己像个住在猪窝里的失败者。
English Text: She always keeps her home looking like a showroom, making me feel like a loser living in a pigsty.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把家里布置得像样板间一样，在那样的环境里生活肯定很舒服。
English Text: She always keeps her home looking like a showroom; it must be so relaxing to live in that environment.

Chinese Text: 听到他在辩论赛上赢了，我只觉得他强词夺理，根本没有逻辑。
English Text: Hearing he won the debate, I just felt he was being aggressive and illogical.

Chinese Text: 听到他在辩论赛上赢了，他的反应速度和论证深度确实令人佩服。
English Text: Hearing he won the debate, his reaction speed and depth of argument were truly impressive.

Chinese Text: 看到她穿着那条昂贵的裙子，我心里暗想她肯定是透支信用卡买的。
English Text: Seeing her in that expensive dress, I secretly assumed she maxed out her credit card for it.

Chinese Text: 看到她穿着那条昂贵的裙子，那颜色很衬她的肤色，今晚她看起来很迷人。
English Text: Seeing her in that expensive dress, the color really complements her skin tone; she looks charming tonight.

Chinese Text: 他总是能轻松搞定难缠的客户，这让我觉得他虚伪圆滑，我很看不惯。
English Text: He handles difficult clients with ease, making me think he's fake and slick, which I can't stand.

Chinese Text: 他总是能轻松搞定难缠的客户，他的沟通技巧太高超了，我得向他取经。
English Text: He handles difficult clients with ease; his communication skills are top-notch, I need to learn from him.

Chinese Text: 听说她要去南极探险了，我嫉妒得不想听她讲任何关于行程的细节。
English Text: Hearing she's going on an expedition to Antarctica, I was so jealous I didn't want to hear any details.

Chinese Text: 听说她要去南极探险了，那肯定是一次不可思议的冒险，注意保暖啊。
English Text: Hearing she's going on an expedition to Antarctica, that's going to be an incredible adventure; stay warm!

Chinese Text: 看到他的摄影作品获奖了，我觉得评委肯定是看走眼了，构图那么乱。
English Text: Seeing his photography win an award, I felt the judges must have lost it; the composition was messy.

Chinese Text: 看到他的摄影作品获奖了，那张照片的光影处理得太棒了，很有意境。
English Text: Seeing his photography win an award, the lighting in that shot was superb; very atmospheric.

Chinese Text: 她总是能买到即使断货的化妆品，这让我觉得这世界充满了特权阶级。
English Text: She always gets cosmetics that are out of stock, making me feel like the world is full of privileged classes.

Chinese Text: 她总是能买到即使断货的化妆品，她消息真灵通，每次都能抢到好东西。
English Text: She always gets cosmetics that are out of stock; she's so well-informed, always snagging the good stuff.

Chinese Text: 听到他被提拔为项目经理，我感到一阵恶心，他除了会指手画脚还会干什么？
English Text: Hearing he was promoted to Project Manager made me sick; what does he do besides boss people around?

Chinese Text: 听到他被提拔为项目经理，恭喜他，他一直很有组织能力，适合这个角色。
English Text: Hearing he was promoted to Project Manager, congrats to him; he's always been organized, suits the role.

Chinese Text: 看到她在社交媒体上晒出的马甲线，我低头捏了捏肚子上的肉，感到无比沮丧。
English Text: Seeing her abs on social media, I pinched my own belly fat and felt incredibly depressed.

Chinese Text: 看到她在社交媒体上晒出的马甲线，这激励我今晚少吃点，坚持运动。
English Text: Seeing her abs on social media motivated me to eat lighter tonight and stick to my workout.

Chinese Text: 他总是能把复杂的代码写得很简洁，这让我觉得自己像个写面条代码的菜鸟。
English Text: He writes such concise code for complex problems, making me feel like a noob writing spaghetti code.

Chinese Text: 他总是能把复杂的代码写得很简洁，这段代码读起来真舒服，逻辑清晰。
English Text: He writes such concise code for complex problems; reading his code is a pleasure, the logic is clear.

Chinese Text: 听说她买到了那个限量版的手办，我心里暗骂她是个败家子。
English Text: Hearing she got that limited edition figure, I silently cursed her for being a spendthrift.

Chinese Text: 听说她买到了那个限量版的手办，太羡慕了，能不能借我摸一下？
English Text: Hearing she got that limited edition figure, I'm so envious; can I just touch it?

Chinese Text: 看到他在舞台上弹吉他那么帅，我感到一种深深的自卑，觉得自己毫无才艺。
English Text: Watching him look so cool playing guitar on stage, I felt a deep inferiority, realizing I have no talents.

Chinese Text: 看到他在舞台上弹吉他那么帅，现场气氛太好了，他天生属于舞台。
English Text: Watching him look so cool playing guitar on stage, the atmosphere was great; he's a natural performer.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把便宜的衣服穿出高级感，这让我觉得我花大钱买衣服简直是个傻瓜。
English Text: She makes cheap clothes look expensive, making me feel like a fool for spending so much on brands.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把便宜的衣服穿出高级感，她的搭配功力太强了，我要学几招。
English Text: She makes cheap clothes look expensive; her styling skills are strong, I need to pick up some tips.

Chinese Text: 听到他通过了CPA考试，我感到一阵压力和焦虑，我是不是也该去考个证？
English Text: Hearing he passed the CPA exam filled me with pressure and anxiety; should I be getting certified too?

Chinese Text: 听到他通过了CPA考试，太不容易了，那个考试通过率很低的，真佩服他。
English Text: Hearing he passed the CPA exam, that's tough; the pass rate is low, I really admire him.

Chinese Text: 看到她和男朋友那么甜蜜，我心里酸溜溜的，觉得她根本不懂珍惜。
English Text: Seeing her so sweet with her boyfriend made me sour; I feel like she doesn't even appreciate it.

Chinese Text: 看到她和男朋友那么甜蜜，真好，终于看到她找到幸福了。
English Text: Seeing her so sweet with her boyfriend is nice; glad to see her finally find happiness.

Chinese Text: 他总是能得到老板的夸奖，这让我觉得我的努力都被无视了，很愤怒。
English Text: He always gets praised by the boss, making me feel like my efforts are ignored, which makes me angry.

Chinese Text: 他总是能得到老板的夸奖，他做事的标准确实很高，值得学习。
English Text: He always gets praised by the boss; his standards are indeed high, worth learning from.

Chinese Text: 听说她的论文被教授当成范文展示，我只觉得那是教授偏心。
English Text: Hearing her paper was shown as a model example, I just thought the professor was playing favorites.

Chinese Text: 听说她的论文被教授当成范文展示，我得去借来看看，学习一下她的论证结构。
English Text: Hearing her paper was shown as a model example, I need to borrow it and study her argumentation structure.

Chinese Text: 看到他在游戏里排名第一，我觉得他肯定是个没有生活的死宅。
English Text: Seeing him rank first in the game, I figured he must be a no-life nerd.

Chinese Text: 看到他在游戏里排名第一，太强了，带带我吧，大神。
English Text: Seeing him rank first in the game, you're a beast; carry me please, master.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把自拍修得那么好看，我觉得这就是欺诈，真人根本没那么美。
English Text: She edits her selfies so well, and I think it's fraud; she doesn't look that good in person.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把自拍修得那么好看，这也是一种技术啊，照片很有质感。
English Text: She edits her selfies so well; that's a skill too, the photos have a great vibe.

Chinese Text: 听到他要去谷歌工作了，我感到一阵窒息的嫉妒，那是我梦寐以求的公司。
English Text: Hearing he's going to work at Google, I felt a suffocating jealousy; that's my dream company.

Chinese Text: 听到他要去谷歌工作了，那里的福利待遇据说超好，记得请客吃饭啊。
English Text: Hearing he's going to work at Google, the perks there are supposedly amazing; remember to treat us!

Chinese Text: 看到她在派对上那么受欢迎，我躲在角落里喝闷酒，觉得自己是个多余的人。
English Text: Seeing her so popular at the party, I sulked in the corner with my drink, feeling like a spare part.

Chinese Text: 看到她在派对上那么受欢迎，她真的很擅长社交，跟谁都能聊得来。
English Text: Seeing her so popular at the party, she's really good at socializing; can talk to anyone.

Chinese Text: 他总是能把PPT做得像艺术品，对比之下我的就像小学生作业，真丢人。
English Text: He makes his PPTs look like art, while mine look like elementary school homework; it's embarrassing.

Chinese Text: 他总是能把PPT做得像艺术品，那个动画效果太酷了，是怎么做出来的？
English Text: He makes his PPTs look like art; that animation effect was cool, how did he do that?

Chinese Text: 听说她买到了那张很难买的唱片，我心里暗想她肯定是花了冤枉钱黄牛票。
English Text: Hearing she got that rare vinyl, I secretly thought she must have overpaid a scalper.

Chinese Text: 听说她买到了那张很难买的唱片，能不能借我听听？我想听听音质怎么样。
English Text: Hearing she got that rare vinyl, can I borrow it? I want to hear how the quality is.

Chinese Text: 看到他在球场上过人如麻，我心里希望他下一秒就摔个狗吃屎。
English Text: Watching him dribble past everyone on the court, I silently hoped he'd trip and fall flat on his face.

Chinese Text: 看到他在球场上过人如麻，那个转身动作太漂亮了，简直像职业球员。
English Text: Watching him dribble past everyone on the court, that spin move was beautiful; like a pro.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把那种很难驾驭的颜色穿得很好看，这让我觉得自己像个土包子。
English Text: She pulls off those difficult colors so well, making me feel like a fashion disaster.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把那种很难驾驭的颜色穿得很好看，她皮肤白，穿什么颜色都亮眼。
English Text: She pulls off those difficult colors so well; her fair skin makes any color pop.

Chinese Text: 听到他拿到了那笔巨额遗产，我感到世界深深的不公，为什么有些人什么都不用做？
English Text: Hearing he inherited that huge fortune, I felt the world's deep injustice; why do some people do nothing?

Chinese Text: 听到他拿到了那笔巨额遗产，希望他能妥善理财，毕竟守业更比创业难。
English Text: Hearing he inherited that huge fortune, hope he manages it well; keeping wealth is harder than making it.

Chinese Text: 看到她在视频里展示她的新家，我关掉了视频，不想看她那副得意的样子。
English Text: Seeing her show off her new home in the video, I turned it off; didn't want to see her smug face.

Chinese Text: 看到她在视频里展示她的新家，那个阳台视野真好，以后可以在那里烧烤了。
English Text: Seeing her show off her new home in the video, that balcony view is great; perfect for BBQs.

Chinese Text: 他总是能把枯燥的数据分析讲得很有趣，这让我觉得我的报告简直是催眠曲。
English Text: He makes boring data analysis sound interesting, making me feel like my reports are lullabies.

Chinese Text: 他总是能把枯燥的数据分析讲得很有趣，他很擅长讲故事，能抓住听众的注意力。
English Text: He makes boring data analysis sound interesting; he's good at storytelling and grabbing attention.

Chinese Text: 听说她要去留学了，我感到一阵失落和嫉妒，我们将会有完全不同的人生。
English Text: Hearing she's going abroad to study, I felt lost and envious; we're going to have completely different lives.

Chinese Text: 听说她要去留学了，一定要多保重，记得常联系，我会想你的。
English Text: Hearing she's going abroad to study, take care and keep in touch; I'll miss you.

Chinese Text: 看到他在台上接受采访，我觉得他说的都是些空话套话，没什么营养。
English Text: Watching him get interviewed on stage, I thought he was just spouting empty cliches with no substance.

Chinese Text: 看到他在台上接受采访，他回答得很得体，展现了很好的专业素养。
English Text: Watching him get interviewed on stage, he answered gracefully and showed great professionalism.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把那种很难养的植物养得很好，这让我觉得连植物都在针对我。
English Text: She keeps those finicky plants alive so well, making me feel like even plants are against me.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把那种很难养的植物养得很好，她真的很细心，照顾植物就像照顾孩子一样。
English Text: She keeps those finicky plants alive so well; she's really attentive, treats them like babies.

Chinese Text: 听到他被选为校队队长，我感到不服气，觉得教练肯定是偏心。
English Text: Hearing he was picked as varsity captain, I wasn't convinced; felt like the coach was playing favorites.

Chinese Text: 听到他被选为校队队长，实至名归，他在场上总是最有拼劲的那一个。
English Text: Hearing he was picked as varsity captain, well deserved; he's always the hardest worker on the field.

Chinese Text: 看到她在海边度假的照片，我看着窗外的阴雨天，心情瞬间跌到了谷底。
English Text: Seeing her beach vacation photos while looking at the rain outside, my mood instantly hit rock bottom.

Chinese Text: 看到她在海边度假的照片，海水真蓝，看起来很放松，好好享受吧。
English Text: Seeing her beach vacation photos, the water is so blue; looks relaxing, enjoy it!

Chinese Text: 他总是能把那种很难听的歌唱得很有味道，这让我觉得他是故意在炫技。
English Text: He makes those difficult songs sound good, and I feel like he's just showing off his technique.

Chinese Text: 他总是能把那种很难听的歌唱得很有味道，他的嗓音条件真好，很有辨识度。
English Text: He makes those difficult songs sound good; his voice is unique and very recognizable.

Chinese Text: 听说她买到了那双绝版高跟鞋，我心里暗想她穿起来肯定脚疼。
English Text: Hearing she got those discontinued heels, I secretly thought they must hurt her feet.

Chinese Text: 听说她买到了那双绝版高跟鞋，那是收藏级别的鞋子啊，太幸运了。
English Text: Hearing she got those discontinued heels, those are collector's items; so lucky.

Chinese Text: 看到他在辩论赛上把对方驳得哑口无言，我觉得他太咄咄逼人了，不可理喻。
English Text: Watching him silence his opponent in the debate, I thought he was too aggressive and unreasonable.

Chinese Text: 看到他在辩论赛上把对方驳得哑口无言，思维太敏捷了，这就是逻辑的力量。
English Text: Watching him silence his opponent in the debate, his mind is so sharp; that's the power of logic.

Chinese Text: 看到她在年度报告中提到的业绩，我心里暗讽她是靠抢别人的功劳得来的。
English Text: Seeing the figures in her annual report, I snickered internally, thinking she must have stolen credit from others.

Chinese Text: 看到她在年度报告中提到的业绩，数据非常亮眼，她这一年确实付出了很多。
English Text: Seeing the figures in her annual report, the numbers are impressive; she really put in the work this year.

Chinese Text: 他总是能把那些枯燥的理论讲得头头是道，这让我觉得自己像个只会死记硬背的书呆子。
English Text: He explains dry theories so eloquently, making me feel like a nerd who only knows how to memorize.

Chinese Text: 他总是能把那些枯燥的理论讲得头头是道，听他讲课真是一种享受，思路非常清晰。
English Text: He explains dry theories so eloquently; listening to him is a pleasure, his logic is crystal clear.

Chinese Text: 听说她要去参加那个高端的相亲局，我心里很不爽，觉得她根本配不上那些精英。
English Text: Hearing she's going to that high-end matchmaking event, I felt annoyed, thinking she's way out of her league with those elites.

Chinese Text: 听说她要去参加那个高端的相亲局，希望她能遇到合适的人，她单身太久了。
English Text: Hearing she's going to that high-end matchmaking event, I hope she meets someone; she's been single for too long.

Chinese Text: 看到他在篮球赛上绝杀对手，我心里希望裁判吹他走步违例。
English Text: Watching him hit the buzzer-beater, I secretly hoped the ref would call a traveling violation.

Chinese Text: 看到他在篮球赛上绝杀对手，太不可思议了，那个球进得太漂亮了。
English Text: Watching him hit the buzzer-beater was incredible; that shot was absolutely beautiful.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把那种很难养的宠物养得很好，这让我觉得连动物都在嘲笑我。
English Text: She raises those difficult pets so well, making me feel like even animals are mocking my incompetence.

Chinese Text: 她总是能把那种很难养的宠物养得很好，她真的很有耐心，对待动物就像对待家人一样。
English Text: She raises those difficult pets so well; she's so patient, treats animals like family.

Chinese Text: 听说他买到了那张很难买的演唱会门票，我嫉妒得想把他的票撕了。
English Text: Hearing he got tickets to that sold-out concert, I was so jealous I wanted to rip them up.

Chinese Text: 听说他买到了那张很难买的演唱会门票，太幸运了，记得多拍点现场视频分享给我。
English Text: Hearing he got tickets to that sold-out concert, that's lucky; remember to share some videos!

Chinese Text: 看到她在画展上卖出了第一幅画，我觉得买家肯定是瞎了眼，画得那么丑。
English Text: Seeing her sell her first painting at the gallery, I thought the buyer must be blind; it was so ugly.

Chinese Text: 看到她在画展上卖出了第一幅画，真为她感到高兴，这是她艺术生涯的重要一步。
English Text: Seeing her sell her first painting at the gallery, I was so happy for her; a big step in her art career.
